This release is focused on powerful **team collaboration** features and significant **performance improvements** under the hood. Prepare for a faster, more connected experience!

üöÄ New Features

  • Team AI **Ask Your Teammate's Shadow:** Get instant answers by querying the AI-powered "shadow" of your teammates' knowledge, documentation, and communications (with their explicit permission, of course!).
  • Collaboration **Invite Teammates:** You can now easily invite colleagues directly to your workspace to share data sources and collaborate on insights.
  • Integrations **New Data Connections:** We've dramatically expanded your ability to ingest data with new, seamless integrations for **Notion, Jira, Confluence, and Gmail**.

‚öôÔ∏è Performance & Fixes

  • **Major Performance Boost:** The entire system is faster! We've moved our data ingestion pipeline to a highly efficient **event-driven architecture**, ensuring real-time data processing and better stability.
  • Fix Resolved an annoying bug that caused display issues when using the app across **multiple screens** or monitors.
